amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 115-830 to increase the Historic Preservation Fund by $5 million to restore level funding with FY 2018.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Courtney amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Courtney.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Courtney amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
